Question 1
  Found [pigeonhole_sort] with compatible type.
  Failure: [pigeonhole_sort] is incorrect.
    The following expression:
    
     | pigeonhole_sort 4 [(3, true); (0, false)]
    produces the following result: [[true; false]] This is invalid. Producing
    the following result is valid: [[false; true]]
